mapper.select: SELECT user.id AS id, phone_number AS "phoneNumber", password, name, sex, is_driver AS "isDriver", model, price, driving_age AS "drivingAge", city AS location, head_potrait AS "headPotrait", user_level AS "userLevel", active AS "isActive" FROM user LEFT JOIN location ON user.location_code = location.location_code WHERE user.id = #{id}

SELECT user.id AS id, phone_number AS "phoneNumber", password, name, sex, is_driver AS "isDriver", model, price, driving_age AS "drivingAge", city AS location, head_potrait AS "headPotrait", user_level AS "userLevel", active AS "isActive" FROM user LEFT JOIN location ON user.location_code = location.location_code WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (phone_number, password, name, sex, is_driver, model, price, driving_age, location_code, head_potrait, user_level, active) VALUES (#{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{isDriver}, #{model}, #{price}, #{drivingAge}, #{locationCode}, #{headPotrait}, #{userLevel}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, is_driver = #{isDriver}, model = #{model}, price = #{price}, driving_age = #{drivingAge}, location_code = #{locationCode}, head_potrait = #{headPotrait}, user_level = #{userLevel}, active = #{isActive} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM vehicle WHERE user_id = #{id}

SELECT vehicle.id AS id, user_id AS userId, brand.brand_name AS brandName, model.model_name AS modelName, location.city AS location, used_hours AS usedHours, vehicle_age AS vehicleAge, equipment_number AS equipmentNumber, description, contact, contact_phone AS contactPhone, tonnage, sell AS isSell, rent AS isRent, sell_state AS sellState, rent_state AS rentState, sell_price AS sellPrice, rent_price AS rentPrice, release_date AS releaseDate, update_date AS updateDate FROM vehicle LEFT JOIN model ON vehicle.model_id = model.id LEFT JOIN brand ON vehicle.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN location ON vehicle.location_code = location.location_code WHERE vehicle.user_id = #{id}
